Question
========

A* is de verzameling van even getallen en *B* van de oneven getallen.
Wat is dan de doorsnede van *A* en *B*?

Answerlist
----------

A ∩ B = ∅
A ∩ B = {0}
A ∩ B = {even getallen}
A ∩ B = {oneven getallen}

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

A ∩ B = ∅: Correct
A ∩ B = {0}: Incorrect
A ∩ B = {even getallen}: Incorrect
A ∩ B = {oneven getallen}: Incorrect
